amendment.description: Amendment sought to create an exception for instances of public health risks, including byproducts of hydraulic fracturing, well stimulation, or any water contamination.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-27 to create an exception for instances of public health risks, including byproducts of hydraulic fracturing, well stimulation, or any water contamination.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 233 (Roll no. 149).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Soto.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Soto amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 233 (Roll no. 149).
